entitySchemaHelper.multipleIsPrimary: Property "entitySchema.properties" contains more than one property with isPrimary set
entitySchemaHelper.invalidEntityProperties: The schema has no properties defined, but the entity has properties
entitySchemaHelper.invalidEntityProperty: The entity value of "{value}" does not match the type "{type}" for property "{property}"
entitySchemaHelper.invalidOptional: The entity property "{property}" of type "{type}" is not optional, but no value has been provided
